channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - phase

item.title: Stepping through the build process with ebuild
item.description: Today I had to verify a patch that I pushed upstream but which was slightly modified. As I don't use the tool myself (it was a user-reported issue) I decided to quickly drum up a live ebuild for the application and install it (as the patch was in the upstream â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
